mapper.insert: insert into media_news_info ( channel_id, column_id, area_id, include_type, quote_price, title, allow_link, allow_qrcode, allow_contactway, image_url, remark, audit_status, created_user ) values ( #{channelId}, #{columnId}, #{areaId}, #{includeType}, #{quotePrice}, #{title}, #{allowLink}, #{allowQRCode}, #{allowContactWay}, #{imageUrl}, #{remark}, #{auditStatus}, #{createdUser} )
mapper.select: select news_media_id newsMediaId, channel_id channelId, column_id columnId, audit_status auditStatus from media_news_info where news_media_id = #{newsMediaId}
mapper.update: update media_news_info set audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_user = #{auditUser}, audit_date = #{auditDate} where news_media_id = #{newsMediaId}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(a.news_media_id) FROM media_news_info a, media_news_channel b, media_news_type c, media_news_column d, member_info e WHERE a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.news_type = c.id AND a.column_id = d.news_column_id AND a.created_user = e.member_id
AND a.created_user = #{createdUser}

SELECT g.*, b.channel_name mediaName, c. NAME mediaType, d.news_column_name mediaColumn, b.link_url linkUrl FROM ( SELECT a.channel_id channelId, a.column_id columnId, a.news_media_id newsMediaId, a.created_user createdUser, a.quote_price quotePrice, a.title title, a.area_id areaId, a.allow_link allowLink, a.allow_qrcode allowQRCode, a.allow_contactway allowContactWay, a.image_url imageUrl, a.include_type includeType, a.remark remark FROM media_news_info a LEFT JOIN media_news_info f ON a.channel_id = f.channel_id AND a.quote_price < f.quote_price WHERE a.audit_status = 1 GROUP BY a.channel_id ) g, media_news_channel b, media_news_type c, media_news_column d, member_info e WHERE g.channelId = b.channel_id AND b.news_type = c.id AND g.columnId = d.news_column_id AND g.createdUser = e.member_id ORDER BY g.createdate desc
limit #{beginLimit}, #{endLimit}
SELECT t.area_id areaId, a.area_name areaName FROM media_news_info t INNER JOIN system_area_info a ON a.area_id = t.area_id WHERE t.audit_status = 1 GROUP BY t.area_id
